doc:
Basil Dignam https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basil_Dignam 0 Basil Dignam (24 October 1905 – 31 January 1979) was an English character actor.Basil Dignam was born in Sheffield, West Riding of Yorkshire. He acted on film and television between 1948 and 1978. He often appeared as an authority figure, such as a police officer, army general or peer. Basil_Dignam ( 24_October_1905 – 31_January_1979 ) was an_English_character_actor.Basil_Dignam was_born in Sheffield , West_Riding of Yorkshire . He acted on film_and_television between 1948_and_1978 . He often appeared as an_authority_figure , such_as a_police_officer , army_general or peer .
